original_text: If you, then, though you are evil, know how to give good gifts to your children, how much more will your Father in heaven give good gifts to those who ask him!
korean_text: 너희가 악한 자라도 좋은 것으로 자식에게 줄 줄 알거든 하물며 하늘에 계신 너희 아버지께서 구하는 자에게 좋은 것으로 주시지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If you, then, though you are evil
know how to give good gifts to your children
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들에게 좋은 것을 줄 줄 알거든

sentences.original_text: how much more will your Father in heaven
